context_of_use: This use case allows admins to monitor and adjust inventory levels to prevent stockouts.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control inventory levels to prevent stockouts.
description: Allow admins to monitor and adjust inventory levels to prevent stockouts.
assumptions: Admin has the necessary permissions to manage inventory.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specific inventory management features required.
main_flow: 1. Admin initiates inventory management → System prompts for authentication.
2. Admin provides authentication credentials → System verifies credentials.
3. Admin accesses inventory management interface → System displays current inventory levels.
4. Admin adjusts inventory levels → System updates inventory records.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If admin is not authenticated, then system denies access and prompts for login.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If authentication fails, then system displays an error message and prompts for re-entry of credentials.
